ir_remote¶

Functions for IR remote

set pin of IR RECEIVER sensor

IR_RECEIVER_PIN¶

Define the code sent by the IR remote control keys

IR_KEY_POWER¶
IR_KEY_MODE¶
IR_KEY_MUTE¶
IR_KEY_PLAY_PAUSE¶
IR_KEY_BACKWARD¶
IR_KEY_FORWARD¶
IR_KEY_EQ¶
IR_KEY_MINUS¶
IR_KEY_PLUS¶
IR_KEY_0¶
IR_KEY_CYCLE¶
IR_KEY_U_SD¶
IR_KEY_1¶
IR_KEY_2¶
IR_KEY_3¶
IR_KEY_4¶
IR_KEY_5¶
IR_KEY_6¶
IR_KEY_7¶
IR_KEY_8¶
IR_KEY_9¶
IR_KEY_ERROR¶
void irBegin()¶

IRremote init.

uint8_t irRead()¶

Read the code received by IR. 

uint8_t key = irRead();
Serial.print('IR recv code:');
Serial.print(key);
if (key == IR_KEY_POWER) {
 Serial.println("IR_KEY_POWER");
}

Returns

uint8_t
